attributes.action: Ban racist language,policies to get votes.Ban party/politicians inciting racism
attributes.additional_details: Phase out colonialist ideologies destructive to society that breed institutional racism & contribute significantly to the instability of society & in equal treatment of Ethnic Minority (EM) community in U.K. make a commitment to stop only highlighting negatives of EM community eg refugee crossings, creating a unrealistic fear of migrants into the U.K. EG Brexit campaign deliberately inflammatory solely to win votes has created a toxic environment. Encourage anti racism society through politics
attributes.background: Stop using racist inflammatory politics/ language to get votes. Ban parties/politicians who incite racial hatred & division in their policies & that only flag incoming people into U.K. in a negative way

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. This is a matter for individual political parties.  Parliament isn't able to ban specific policies because it is unable to bind its successors (a future Parliament could overturn a ban).
